Events

1 March 2015 to 6 March 2015

https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/org/meetings/2015WinterDevMeeting

Roger and Jake at RightsCon in Manila

24 March 2015 to 24 March 2015

https://www.rightscon.org/manila/

Tor booth at FOSDEM 2015

30 January 2015 to 31 January 2015

The Tor Project and torservers.net will share a booth at FOSDEM’15 in Brussels, Belgium. Meet Tor developers and volunteers running the network!

Many Tor people at PETS in Philadelphia

30 June 2015 to 2 July 2015

https://petsymposium.org/2015/

Jacob talking about Tor in Tokyo, Japan at FSIJ meeting

22 January 2015 to 22 January 2015

Jacob is giving a talk about Tor and OTR hosted by the Free Software Initiative of Japan.

Roger doing invited talk at Real World Crypto in London

6 January 2015 to 9 January 2015

http://www.realworldcrypto.com/rwc2015

Roger, Jake, many others at 31c3 in Hamburg

26 December 2014 to 30 December 2014

http://events.ccc.de/2014/07/12/31c3-call-for-participation-en/

Roger at WPES and CCS in Phoenix

2 November 2014 to 7 November 2014

https://www.cylab.cmu.edu/news_events/events/wpes2014/
http://www.sigsac.org/ccs/CCS2014/

Roger @ ISCI “1984+30” panel, UC Berkeley

6 October 2014 to 6 October 2014

The International Computer Science Institute of UC Berkeley is organizing a day of discussions: 1984+30: Navigating Privacy Threats and Protections in the Digital Age on October 6th.

Andrew Keynotes Broadband World Forum

21 October 2014 to 23 October 2014

Andrew delivering keynote address at Broadband World Forum

Roger @ FOCI ’14, San Diego, CA

18 August 2014 to 18 August 2014

Roger Dingledine will attend the 4th USENIX Workshop on Free and Open Communications on the Internet in San Diego, California, USA.

Researchers & Practitioners Meetup @ PETS, Amsterdam

15 July 2014 to 15 July 2014

We have arranged for two rooms near the venue of PETS for an "unconference" around practical applications of privacy technology on the day before the symposium begins.

Tor @ 35th IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy, San Jose, CA

18 May 2014 to 21 May 2014

Roger Dingledine, Ian Goldberg and other members of the larger Tor community will attend the 35th IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy held in San Jose, California, USA.

Lunar @ LSM 2014, Montpellier, France

5 July 2014 to 11 July 2014

Lunar will attend the 15th Libre Software Meeting in Montpellier, France.

Colin Childs Presenting Tor @ CryptoParty, Winnipeg

7 June 2014 to 7 June 2014

Join host Colin Childs at the Winnipeg Cryptoparty. Presenters Colin Child's and others (TBD) will cover Anonymity Tools (Tor) and Secure Communication Tools (GnuPG, OTR)

Tor's Summer Dev Meeting - Paris, France

29 June 2014 to 3 July 2014

Tor's Summer 2014 Developers Meeting is being hosted by Mozilla in Paris, France.

Tor @ Stockholm Internet Forum

27 May 2014 to 29 May 2014

Tor at Stockholm Internet Forum

Kelley @ Women in Cyber Security Conference, Nashville, TN

11 April 2014 to 12 April 2014

Kelley will be attending and participating on a panel at the Women in Cyber Security Conference. The conference is being held in Nashville, TN on April 11 and 12.

Kelley @ CERIAS Symposium, Purdue University

25 March 2014 to 27 March 2014

Kelley will be attending the annual The Center for Education and Research in Information Assurance and Security (CERIAS) symposium at Purdue University, Wednesday, March 26 and Thursday, March 27.

Civil Rights Defenders, Defender's Days

1 April 2014 to 4 April 2014

Andrew and Jacob at Civil Rights Defenders, Defender's Days.

Andrew @ Boston Network Users Group Meeting

4 March 2014 to 4 March 2014

Andrew presenting Tor at the Boston Network Users Group held at the Microsoft Store in the Burlington Mall. See http://www.bnug.org/ for more details.

Karen and Kelley @ SXSW, Austin, TX

7 March 2014 to 11 March 2014

Karen and Kelley will attending SXSW 2014 in Austin, TX. You can see Karen present
Tips & Tools for Protected Connection on Tuesday, March 11th or visit us at the Knight Foundation booth in the Exhibitors Hall.

Kelley @ 2014 CAR Conference, Baltimore

1 March 2014 to 1 March 2014

Kelley will be presenting digital safety for journalists at the 2014 CAR conference in Baltimore, MD, Saturday, March 1 starting at 10:00 am.

Andrew at Boston/Cambridge Countersurveillance DiscoTech

1 March 2014 to 2 March 2014

The Civic Media: Codesign Studio team (codesign.mit.edu) is organizing and hosting a countersurveillance DiscoTech (short for “Discovering Technology”) on March 1st and 2nd, 2014, at the MIT Media Lab. A DiscoTech is a workshop for people of all skill levels to learn about a set of technologies.

Tor @ LibrePlanet 2014, MIT, Cambridge, MA

21 March 2014 to 22 March 2014

Come check out the Tor Project booth and meet members of our global team at LibrePlanet 2014 on March 22nd-23rd 2014, MIT, Cambridge, MA.

Privacy SOS CryptoParty at NorthEastern University in Boston

9 February 2014 to 9 February 2014

Learn more, http://privacysos.org/party

Tor Presenting @ New Media Inspiration 2014, Prague, Czech Republic

7 February 2014 to 7 February 2014

Aaron Gibson will be presenting a talk at the New Media Inspiration 2014 conference in Prague on February 8, 2014.

Colin Childs Presenting Tor @ CryptoParty, Winnipeg

8 February 2014 to 8 February 2014

Colin Childs is hosting and presenting at the Winnipeg CryptoParty on February 8, 2014. The focus will be on installing and using anonymity and secure communication tools including Tor.

Tor's Winter 2014 Developers Meeting, Reykjavik, Iceland

16 February 2014 to 21 February 2014

The Tor Project will be having it's bi-annual Developers Meeting and Hack Day Events in the beautiful city of Reykjavik, Iceland February 17 thru 21, 2014.

Roger @ Usenix Security Symposium, San Diego, CA

20 August 2014 to 22 August 2014

Roger will be attending the Usenix Security Symposium August 20-22, 2014 in San Diego, CA. The USENIX Security Symposium brings together researchers, practitioners, system administrators, system programmers, and others interested in the latest advances in the security of computer systems and networks.

Tor @ PETS 2014, Amsterdam

16 July 2014 to 18 July 2014

Roger and members of the Tor team will be attending PETS 2014 in Amsterdam, July 16 - 18, 2014. The 14th Privacy Enhancing Technologies Symposium (PETS) addresses the design and realization of privacy services for the Internet and other data systems and communication networks by bringing together anonymity and privacy experts from around the world to discuss recent advances and new perspectives.

Roger @ George Mason University, Washington, DC

11 April 2014 to 11 April 2014

Roger will be speaking at George Mason University, Research Hall, Room 163, on April 11, 2014. Invited by the Department of Computer Science Roger will discuss "Tor and Censorship: Lessons Learned".

Tor @ Financial Crypto 2014, Barbados

2 March 2014 to 2 March 2014

Roger Dingledine and Nick Hopper will be attending the Financial Cryptopraphy and Data Security Conference, March 3 - 7, 2014 in Barbados. Financial Cryptography and Data Security is a major international forum for research, advanced development, education, exploration, and debate regarding information assurance, with a specific focus on commercial contexts.

Roger @ NSF WATCH Seminar Series, Arlington, VA

13 January 2014 to 13 January 2014

Roger will be speaking at the The Washington Area Trustworthy Computing Hour (WATCH) seminar series on January 14, 2014 in Arlington VA. The series is jointly organized by NSF’s Computer Science and Engineering (CISE) and Social, Behavioral, and Economic (SBE) Directorates and the Office of Cyberinfrastructure (OCI), and sponsored by the CISE Trustworthy Computing Program.

Tor @ FOSDEM, Brussels

31 January 2014 to 31 January 2014

Lunar will be attending FOSDEM in Brussels, February 1-2, 2014. FOSDEM is a free event that offers open source communities a place to meet, share ideas and collaborate.

Tor @ Real World Crypto 2014, New York City, USA

13 January 2014 to 15 January 2014

Several members of the Tor project will attend the Real World Cryptography workshop 2014.
